item.title: Arthur Gyl interviews Jean-Christophe Ploquin
item.description: Arthur Gyl and Jean-Christophe Ploquin discuss the creation of interactive musical games. How to transition from the Music & Me exhibition to video games? A fascinating conversation about artistic innovation and technical challenges.
